channel.title: Model Query
channel.description: I know at the moment there is a craze to make your own models and import them to the client, but i was wondering something. Is there a limit to the polygons ,a model imported into the client, can have? If so what is it? Is there a maximum size? How much detail can a model retain before the client rejects it? Or can it be perfectly rendered and accepted?

im sorry i was unaware that as soon as i got CM im expected to know everything
[/quote]

I’m sorry that the person who gave you CM didn’t think through it first.

Pretty damn sure you should know something before you are given the title…[/quote]
i know plenty thanks but it happens to be unrelated to this topic which is why i asked
